Description:
PERFECT FAMILY HOME IN CENTRAL EPPING
It's all about the location and the wonderful lifestyle opportunity with this immaculately presented contemporary family home, nestled in a quiet family friendly court locale, in arguably one of the most sought after pockets of Epping Central where everything you need is at your doorstep. Just a leisurely stroll to Dalton Village Shopping precinct, cafes, eateries, Epping train station, bus services, an excellent choice of schools including St Monica's College, Melbourne Polytechnic and only minutes to Pacific Plaza, COSTCO, Northern Hospital and easy access to major freeways. Boasting formal lounge room with feature electric fire place, separate dining area, master bedroom with full ensuite and walk in robes, additional 3 bedrooms all with built in robes serviced by huge family bathroom, bonus powder room and study. The bright, well equipped kitchen is centrally located to create a defined family hub and includes stainless steel appliances, gas cooktop, wall oven, 900 mm rangehood and dishwasher, further complemented by spacious living/meals area and good sized separate laundry. Blessed with a very desirable north facing rear aspect great for warmth and natural light, entertain, relax and enjoy the paved alfresco area overlooking neat, low maintenance landscaped gardens with plenty of room for the kids to play and run around. Features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, carpets to bedrooms, tiles throughout, quality light fittings and window furnishings,high ceilings with decorative cornices, neutral colour decor, drive through remote controlled double garage plus so much more.
